name: pawpal_backend
description: This module handles the construction of the system prompt for the PawPal AI Assistant. It takes structured pet data and the user's question, then injects them into the strict safety-focused system prompt.

scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const dbUrl = process.env.DATABASE_URL || ''; if (dbUrl.startsWith('postgres') || process.env.RENDER) { fs.copyFileSync('prisma/schema.postgres.prisma', 'prisma/schema.prisma'); console.log('Switched to PostgreSQL schema'); }" && npx prisma generate && tsc
scripts.start: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const dbUrl = process.env.DATABASE_URL || ''; if (dbUrl.startsWith('postgres') || process.env.RENDER) { fs.copyFileSync('prisma/schema.postgres.prisma', 'prisma/schema.prisma'); console.log('Ensuring PostgreSQL schema for start'); }" && npx prisma db push && node dist/server.js
